website_summaries.verdict: This solid, inexpensive, and fog-free paintball helmet is a simple, yet effective solution that delivers the standard protection your head needs.
pros: Smoke-tinted thermal lens won’t fog up
cons: Its foam padding could be a bit softer

customer_reviews.title: Good mask for simunitions training
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for simunitions training with a police Emergency Response Team. The lenses had no problem stopping multiple direct hits from simunitions pellets and the mask is comfortable even for long sessions. Haven’t had any issues at all. Not the cheapest option, but also pretty good quality. I rate it as a good value.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: The thermal lens has an annoying blue tint. It is almost like the glass at the top of a windshield. I have two masks and this is my loaner mask. It isnt bad, but it isnt great either. I would still prefer it greatly over a rental. Probably decent for its price range. EDIT. I am an idiot. The blue tint is just the protective cover. You have to peel it off.
customer_reviews.author: Tokyomitsubishi

customer_reviews.title: Good mostly
customer_reviews.text: I live in the southern US and it still fogs up occasionally on somewhat humid days, that should be expected though. It is comfortable and protects most of your head, which is what it is designed to do. I can confirm after taking 4 close range goggle shots it has not splattered into the eye protection area alsoif that is a concern for anyone else ( No I did not voluntarily take those shots.)
customer_reviews.author: MoviezRhino

customer_reviews.title: anit fog works well
customer_reviews.text: I played for the first time with this mask on a wet day and the lens never fogged. Others wearing glasses had fogging problems on their glasses (brand?) I was shot twice in head, once from behind that went inside and was hard to clean on the field. Found it easy to remove lens and do cleaning while not being shot at.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great mask.
customer_reviews.text: I was paint balling for several hours although it was not too hot it was still humid and I was running around this mask did NOT fog at all. This mask does everything that other more expensive masks without the cost. Great buy but in an extra $10-$15 dollars and get this mask.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: It's a great mask... For smaller heads.
customer_reviews.text: I was so pumped about buying this, but when I got it I realized that I must have a longer face than most so my jawline is completely exposed. My forehead too, but that's what bandanas, beanies, and kefeyas are for. I unfortunately hVe to send it back and find a mask that better fits my long head. I've used other masks without thermal lenses and I'm so ready for anti fog bliss.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Williams

customer_reviews.title: excellent mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: does not fog up. excellent mask for the price. was looking for a budget mask and this did the job. had no issues on the field and it gave me an advantage. the seller was very professional and easy to deal with. will buy from them again. I purchased 2 and my friend was also very impressed for the money. just remember to take off the plastic protector on the inside of the mask. its very thin and not noticeable .
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reviewer!!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable, hard to breath, everything is wrong with this mask, get the dye I4 or a Vforce entry level, they are a 1000x more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mask for the co-angler on my bass boat. It is comfortable , priced right, and does the job of keeping an exposed face from going numb in 25-degree weather at 60 MPH. I don't play paintball, but if bass fishing doesn't work out I'll keep it for paintball. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Rig

customer_reviews.title: It Adjust to fit most and is all and all a pretty good mask
customer_reviews.text: As advertized. Haven't taken it n the field yet but i hyperventilated it in for a min outside and no fog.lol Also there it a chin strap which i don't think is advertized. It Adjust to fit most and is all and all a pretty good mask. Kind of hurts my ears when i take it on and off, i wish there was i little piece of foam on the very back piece of plastic the covers your ears to prevent that. Other than that this is a great buy for the price. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: casey shyer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for someone looking for affordable quality!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect paintball mask for someone who wants quality without breaking the bank! Wore for hours in heat with almost no fogging at all. Pretty damn impressed with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lance T.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one I'll order again
customer_reviews.text: I've got a lot of years in paint balling - used a lot of mid range masks going up to about $50. This is the one I will order again. Does what it should - doesn't fog - puts up with abuse. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and mask did not fog up!
customer_reviews.text: Face mask worked as advertised and love that the lens comes off and can be cleaned easily. Did not fog up during the day though wondering how it holds up after multiple outings. Seemed very breathable and kept me protected which was most important part after getting shot in face several times.
customer_reviews.author: enycel

customer_reviews.title: Quality mask that doesn't fog up
customer_reviews.text: I've used it in everything from 45-93°F. It doesn't fog up. It's light and comfortable. It does the job no problem. It's a great mask for the money!
customer_reviews.author: misipi

customer_reviews.title: Good paintball masks
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this paintball mask I thought the chin strap would be gimmicky but I actually used it
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, lacks gopro mountability
customer_reviews.text: I love the mask, the lense pops out fast for quick cleaning. Ive used the mask for about twenty matches in summer and winter. This mask neger fogs no matter what i do. It fits on comfortably on my face and doesnt wobble or fall off no matter what indo to it. The visor comes off the top if you dont want it. My only complaint on this mask is there is absolutely nowhere to attatch a gopro on the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Bought it becouse of description said that its a smoked ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it becouse of description said that its a smoked lense. But its not, its clear. Will update rating if seller willing to send the lense that suposed to be on it.
customer_reviews.author: ivan

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job and does not fog up with running around
customer_reviews.text: I use this to play air soft. It does a great job and does not fog up with running around.
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: 7hours in high heat did not fog once
customer_reviews.text: for the price you cant go wrong if you are just trying to avoid using a rental mask this is great. im not sure how long it will last after one day (about 7 hours) the foam for the forehead is already pealing off easy fix with some glue i guess.
customer_reviews.author: jake revelette

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Didnt fog up until the very end of paintballing. Played in 40 degree weather and was sweating a good amount but held its own till the last match. Probably can find a cheaper version that does the same but went for quality based on # of reviews
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter helmet but it still fogs
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginners or someone looking for a budget friendly mask
customer_reviews.author: Taurean Mcdade

customer_reviews.title: I have a very small head so I am happy the this mask can be tightened enough to comfortably ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small head so I am happy the this mask can be tightened enough to comfortably fit me withouth slipping off but can also be loosened enough to fit my boyfriend. Keeps the flare off in the sunlight, havent run around in it yet to see if the anti fog i any good but I have high hopes. It is double paned plastic that is vented in the gap to let out heat and humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Paintball mask
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great mask it didn't fog and it stayed in place when running.
customer_reviews.author: michael wood

customer_reviews.title: Great mask. It also didn't fog up nearly as ...
customer_reviews.text: I took half a dozen paintballs to the face and didn't even feel it. Great mask. It also didn't fog up nearly as much as every one else's masks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year used often still looks and feels brand new
customer_reviews.author: leo

customer_reviews.title: Get one.. Get two
customer_reviews.text: Makes a world of difference. Playing paintball with friends couple times a year... Get this mask. I am no pro, I don't plan on being one. Bought this mask play couple times a year because the ones they rent you at the fields are horrible and fog in about three mins. I was fog free the entire time which made me seem like an all star out there because I could actually see.
customer_reviews.author: Jrod

customer_reviews.title: Solid fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits good, comfortable. Keeps my glasses in place and keeps them from moving around. Haven't used in the field yet. Little to no blind spots from what I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The vents don't allow for the best ventilation and breathing well when running
customer_reviews.text: The vents don't allow for the best ventilation and breathing well when running, but it is a good face mask for protection. Probably going to modify it some. The lenses in it are great though, and the main reason I bought this. It allows for great vision without glare, even on bright and sunny days!
customer_reviews.author: Caytfa

customer_reviews.title: Visibility for days.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fog up once. Just wish it came in a digital woodland camo. Comfortable for a full day of playing but not a perfect fit for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: chazkez

customer_reviews.title: Less vents than in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I got a different version of the product to that shown. no check vents etc. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My sons say these were awesome! Worked great, no fogging during an all day paintball event. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: larkflying

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive mask that doesn't fog.
customer_reviews.text: I sweat profusely around the head; cold damp day; these don't fog. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: It's worth much more than its price. Never fogs
customer_reviews.text: Does not fog up at all. I'm a bigger guy I breathe very very heavy. All other masks fog up but I didn't feel like spending 100 plus on dye i3's or crazy masks like that. I promise you this mask is well well worth it and is very well priced
customer_reviews.author: fox14

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean and take off lenses
customer_reviews.text: i give this mask 4 stars. it is very well made, easy to clean and take off lenses, it is thermal lense so it doesnt fog, and it is pretty cheap, but well made. the only reason i dont give the mask a 5 star is because the nose rest is a tad uncomfortable, but manageable. other than that it is a very good mask for the price. i would recommend it to anyone. (p.s. i usually wear a bandana with the mask, only because it reduces sweating, which also helps prevent fog, and it makes it alot easier to put on and take off the mask
customer_reviews.author: tina bohaboy

customer_reviews.title: Great antifog lenses.  Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love that these don't fog...ever. Play airsoft in them, and I sweat a lot. Fit and finish are great, lens is easy to remove. Elastic is wide and holds its shape well. Lots of vents, and can hear well out of it. Visor is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Berfel

customer_reviews.title: So Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been hesitant to go paint balling because I desperately need glasses to see and whenever we go, everything fogs up super bad. I got this as a last ditch attempt and am so glad that I did. Zero fog the entire time we were out (4 hours). Great mask and you should not hesitate on buying it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Did not receive item as displayed. The mask received did not have the same ventilation in the mouth and jawline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipment/storage flaw?
customer_reviews.text: Very unsatisfied with fitment. As if the mask was warped. If you can see in the picture the nose Bridge is pinched. Maybe storage or shipment issue. This specific mask wouldn't fit anyone unless you have a very wide head to stretch the mask apart.
customer_reviews.author: Th3unwant3d1

customer_reviews.title: Great starter mask
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this mask. Great starter mask. Don't let the word starter hold you back. The price point is great for someone that is entering paintball. The lense are quality. Very helpful as they are did not fog up during some fall weather in our area. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Eddie Pabon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE These, we have 5 and are ordering at least 5 more. Easy to clean, super durable, stylish looking.
customer_reviews.author: CC Sysadmin

customer_reviews.title: Suited and booted
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very nice in style. I feel like Master Chief off of Halo with it on. It didn't fog up and was easy to clean after taking a couple straight to the face.
customer_reviews.author: LeQuese DeJournett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mask for the price. Very comfortable and fits very well on my small head. I am sure there are other masks that are more comfortable but not for $30. Great mask if your an occasional paintball player like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better value
customer_reviews.text: I use this to protect my face in heavy rains while fishing. Much cheaper than the name brand and does pretty good in a storm.
customer_reviews.author: renfeh07

customer_reviews.title: Clear vision, low price, good buy.
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected for the price I paid. Highly suggest it if you wanna play hard at a budget. My vision was never impaired on a pretty muggy day in the wet woods.
customer_reviews.author: D__mcqueen

customer_reviews.title: great price for thermal lens mask
customer_reviews.text: you cant beat the price for this thermal mask. only downside is the foam is not super comfortable and pinches your head a bit.
customer_reviews.author: jason m crinklaw

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Received on Friday, took it out to play Saturday. Mask was great good fit, breathable. Mask did not fog up . we played all day. mask was comfortable what more can you ask for. Would definitely recommend. Great quality for the price..
customer_reviews.author: ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the rental mask at the fields but fogs easier than my 100.00 mask
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Did great in pouring rain while driving 65 mph
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a raining day on the water bass fishing. Did great in pouring rain while driving 65 mph. No fog.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: perfect mask
customer_reviews.text: Best mask I've ever had. I've played meant games with this mask and it has never fogged or ever given me trouble. The inner mask is made of a super thin plastic and is fairly east to scratch. so just keep that in mind when scrubbing grime off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Waskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Mask is ok. You get what you pay for ...
customer_reviews.text: Mask is ok. You get what you pay for. The glue that binds the foam to the mask is where they are able to keep the price low.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask nice protection and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask! Didnt fog up in 75degree weather and was comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: sommer sanchez-pulido

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to but it's good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Takes some getting used to but it's good quality for the price. It's a bit uncomfortable on the ears without any padding too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a back up but I didn’t like the way it felt on my face so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a back up but I didn’t like the way it felt on my face so I gave it to my son to use ,he likes it and says it never fogged up, he also where’s glasses and said plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Garson Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy and low profile mask, the visor can be removed easily , which is exactly what i needed since i also use an M88 helmet as part of my gear. Does not fog although i wish the foam on the interior of the mask was a little more soft. Overall great buy, I'm really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the money. It has a very nice build quality with a nice lense. I played in 85f for 5 hours with no fogging issues. It was also a humid day. I wish the visibility was a little better but it's not that big of a issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Bastulli

customer_reviews.title: Worked well like its supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Worked well like its supposed to. Love the visibility, and was able to use it the day after receiving it in the mail.
customer_reviews.author: MMONTOYA98

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask
customer_reviews.text: Awesome face mask. Never fogs up no mater how cold or hot. When it brakes I’ll be buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Drolette

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet.
customer_reviews.text: foggy goggles, strong mask, good fit, great mask. reviews tell it like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod skyta

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Grandson and he really likes it
customer_reviews.author: Karla A. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Fogged up real fast
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy... fogged up the first hour.. not worth the price..
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Make it holey
customer_reviews.text: I used a heated pick and melted holes into the mask to reduce fogging. It worked while everyone else was fogged I hit them with paintballs. Haha
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the cash
customer_reviews.text: For the price of these things they're spectacular! Replaceable goggles and they don't fog up at all. The foam isn't super comfortable but it's easily swapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great mask ..only thing..my jawbone was hit with a paintball last Sunday.. it barely exposes the bottom of your jaw bone...
customer_reviews.author: Marco roche

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great mask. good peripheral view and protects face very well with good ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! Fits securely, and absolutely does not fog on me. I don't think you can beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Clear lense. Love it. I feel like I can take on all of ISIS in this fantastic mask.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask but the only problem I have is that I can't aim good because the mask is on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Vucko Velickovic

customer_reviews.title: great mask for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic mask. I got fed up with masks getting fogged so I looked at this. Played a 5 hour game of paintball and not once did it fog. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price. No problems with fog and cleans up easy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Grimes

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this mask and it worked great. No fogging what so ever
customer_reviews.text: Paintball in New York February 2015. Purchased this mask and it worked great. No fogging what so ever. It was snowing and around 20 degrees on an outdoor field. Very good protection. The only reason I didn't give the fifth star is the mask has a bulky feel to it but other than that it's great for the price. It was shipped promptly and packaged excellently.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Absolutely worth it. Good fit. No fogging in humid 90s weather. One of the best purchases under 40$ I've made in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Dubso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual player!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mask for months now and it's still amazing! Super comfortable and doesn't really fog up a lot. It's very easy to take off lense and the visor for cleaning, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable, true anti-fog.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these goggles after suffering through a very foggy day of paintball using rental gear. Man, do these make a huge difference. Even if you're not a serious paintballer, these make the experience so much better that they would be worth owning even if you only play once a year.
customer_reviews.author: AJSeese

customer_reviews.title: Works well. I am using it in South Alabama ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I am using it in South Alabama which has very high humidity and i have no issues with it fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W.

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: I used this first in the dead of summer and it worked perfectly. No fog problems whatsoever, great field of vision and it is pretty comfortable as far as masks go.
customer_reviews.author: jonny_jams

customer_reviews.title: Buy this mask
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic never fogged I ware glasses and this mask was perfect. The price is perfect. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moulton

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made, fit is great
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, fit is great, even for large heads like mine. I think this mask would fit 7 1/2 plus with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Aric

customer_reviews.title: Shows as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It was great it covered my ears and forehead Although the foam on the inside is a bit hard it other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: Ana Pineda

customer_reviews.title: I finally found it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding a mask that doesn't dog that isn't a 200 dollar mask. This mask works amazing for me. This is an amazing mask!
customer_reviews.author: CODY

customer_reviews.title: Just impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, very well built. There is no other low priced mask I'd wear. If your not going to shell out $125 plus, this is your mask. - Avid , semi pro player.
customer_reviews.author: jp727

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Use it for AIRSOFT in the MD area and so far during fall season there is no fog issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Adams

customer_reviews.title: It's getting hot in here.
customer_reviews.text: So, this thing has two panes of plastic with some air channels in between. It works decently well. It will not stop bullets.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Stove

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Had to take lens off to get film off of inside but otherwise good.
customer_reviews.author: Scottza

customer_reviews.title: Nice economy fog-proof mask!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a mask that doesn't fog up! Comfortable enough. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. McClain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mask. Very comfortable. Never fogs up. Good size. 9/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Addicted_To_Prime

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a rental mask!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fog but it’s pretty scratched for only four uses but great mask for the price tag!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Show Girl & Crew

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for the price. Have never had it fog up on me. WARNING be careful cleaning the inside lens. The outer lens is tough and can be wiped to clean but the inside lens is soft and scratches easily. I learned this the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Lina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Fine for price
customer_reviews.text: Okay mask for the price. Visor is flimsy and had to be taken off after 5 min of play. It does fog over once in awhile but for price not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: invert helix thermal goggles
customer_reviews.text: Product comes as pictured, lens is double paneled so as to keep from fog accumulating on the inside the lens. This goggles do just that. It is highly resistant, not fog proof, but highly resistant. I would recommend this goggles. If playing in the woods I would recommend green.
customer_reviews.author: woodsballman

customer_reviews.title: great product, recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this. He says it works great. he should know, he uses it every weekend. Packaged great and it came quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TFlores.Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Lens
customer_reviews.text: I love the mask but is the lens supposed to be yellow. When I look out of it everything is brownish is that supposed to happen please comment back telling me
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H. Hoger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, he loves it. Doesn't fog up when he's playing.
customer_reviews.author: hcp22

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask for the money. Super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it. A little stiff but the lense is the selling point. I would definitely suggest this for someone just getting into the sport and on a budget
customer_reviews.author: jerrod young

customer_reviews.title: It's not uncomfortable but there are a lot better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: It's not uncomfortable but there are a lot better ones out there. Try different ones on in a store before buying. Doesn't fog tho
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, NO foging up
customer_reviews.text: Great mask, NO foging up!!! Played the first game on a super hot day and finely I could see. New price is also great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for 5 in our family. It was about 35 degrees while playing and no one reported any fogging. Great mask for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice mask had nothing wrong with it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Edson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I used this mask for 4 hours yesterday playing in ~40F. This mask never once fogged up as I was running through the woods breathing heavily through my nose and mouth. Excellent quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good price and performance, even though the foam could be better
customer_reviews.author: carcalifornia

product_meta.title: Invert Helix Thermal Paintball Goggles Mask - Olive
product_meta.description: Features Light smoke thermal lens Dual density foam Hard mask Plastic lens clip Visor
feature_bullets: Empire Helix Thermal Paintball Goggles - Olive
